PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff><Mandragora Gardening> has been
unlocked!</COL>

You can have Mandragoras reside in your room and
interact with them like partner Pawns.
You can also nurture them by providing items as
fertilizer.

After clearing the unlocking quest and receiving
the reward planter, let's cultivate them through
your partner Pawns or the Mandragoras.

<Mandragora Cultivation>

By cultivating Mandragoras, you can create items
such as "Bonus Dungeon Tickets".

To cultivate Mandragoras, you need to choose the
"Crafting item" and "Fertilizer".
It takes 18 hours to complete the cultivation.

<Mandragora Evolution>

When nurturing a Mandragora, the type of
fertilizer selected can cause the Mandragora to
evolve and change its appearance.

Additionally, the current type of Mandragora can
be changed to any previously discovered type.
However, the choice of "which type to nurture
from" can affect its evolution, so please be
cautious when nurturing.

<Mandragora Observation Journal>

When a new species is discovered, the information
will be recorded in the "Mandragora Journal".
There are also rare types that even Professor
Aidas, an expert on Mandragoras, has not
discovered.
<COL ffdc78>If a rarity R or MR type is found,
the player character's name will be recorded in
the journal.</COL>

Let's try various fertilizers and discover new
species.
